name: Moyo Studios
tag_list: mobile, social, casual, games, interactive, media, entertainment
overview:
Moyo Inc. mission is to empower brands by spreading happiness and providing extraordinary consumer experiences in mobile, interactive entertainment.

Moyo Inc. is the premier producer of mobile games and entertainment - a pioneering company dedicated to quality to create, innovate and grow.

By turning great ideas into world-class content, we deliver top notch products to top notch agencies, publishers and brands in the US and around the world.

Moyo Inc. headquarters are located in Venice Beach, Los Angeles, California.

History Established in 2008 Founded in Venice, CA in 2008 by two former business partners from Sweden, one tech genius and one design elite, who identified an opportunity at the announcement of the Apple iPhone & AppStore. Their passion, creativity, and synergy created Moyo Studios, an interactive advertising agency.

Catalyzed by the unique rising opportunity in the mobile market and the founder’s lifelong love of video games, Moyo strategically narrowed its business focus to mobile entertainment.

In the upcoming year, Moyo sets out to align the core and casual gamer generations. Moyo will create Causal, Social, and Augmented Reality games that use re”ned simplicity and dynamic content to keep players engaged.

In addition, Moyo will continue to explore and invent new consumer acquisition, retention and monetization methods.

Moyo is a privately held and funded California Corporation.
